perturbation.original_text: This amendment to Section 2 (titled "Term"), Part B of the Co-Branding Agreement is made effective December 9, 1996 by and between PC Quote, Inc. (hereinafter referred to as "PCQ") and A.B. Watley, Inc. (hereinafter referred to as "ABW"), who are also the parties contracted in the aforementioned Co-Branding Agreement. This Amendment shall apply to said PCQ and ABW and all of their subsidiaries and related companies.
perturbation.changed_text: This amendment to Section 2 (titled "Term"), Part B of the Co-Branding Agreement is made effective December 9, 1996 by and between PC Quote, Inc. (hereinafter referred to as "PCQ") and A.B. Watley, Inc. (hereinafter referred to as "ABW"), who are also the parties contracted in the aforementioned Co-Branding Agreement. This Amendment shall apply only to PCQ and ABW and excludes all of their subsidiaries and related companies.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states the amendment applies to subsidiaries and related companies. The modified text explicitly excludes them, creating a direct contradiction regarding the scope of the amendment's application.

perturbation.original_text: A.B. Watley, Inc. PC Quote, Inc. Mr. Steven Malin Mr. Howard Meltzer Director President
perturbation.changed_text: A.B. Watley, Inc. PC Quote, Inc. Mr. Steven Malin Mr. Howard Meltzer Legal Counsel President
perturbation.explanation: In the original text, Steven Malin is the director. The modified version changes his role to Legal Counsel, creating ambiguity about his actual position and authority within the company.

perturbation.original_text:
AGREED TO BY:

/s/ Steven Malin /s/ Howard Meltzer - -------------------------- --------------------------------- A.B. Watley, Inc. PC Quote, Inc. Mr. Steven Malin Mr. Howard Meltzer Director President Date:  12/5/96 Date:   12/12/96      -------------- ----------------
perturbation.changed_text:
AGREED TO BY:

/s/ Steven Malin /s/ Howard Meltzer - -------------------------- --------------------------------- A.B. Watley, Inc. PC Quote, Inc. Mr. Steven Malin Mr. Howard Meltzer Director Interim President Date:  12/5/96 Date:   12/12/96      -------------- ----------------
perturbation.explanation: The original text refers to Howard Meltzer as President. The modified text specifies “Interim President.” This introduces uncertainty. Is the agreement only valid while he is interim, or does it extend if the ‘Interim’ tag is removed?
